code: import{combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{legacy_createStore as createStore}from"redux";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from"redux-form";import gen_modelsReducer from"./reducer-gen_models";var reducers=combineReducers({form:formReducer,gen_modelsReducer:gen_modelsReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));window.store=store;export default store;
